page.title: 07POPULATION SURVEY
page.content: In the 12Km area all the population lives in either Comberton or Toft, apart from those at 3 isolated farms. We estimate the population is about 3400.The number of children is about 2000.There are about 1000 married adults and 400 unmarried. There are 40 people who live in the old people's home in Toft.The old people get cheaper fares on trains and buses.If it's freezing in Winter they get cheaper electricity.Some people are willing to give others practical help,some are not.Most people drive but the elderly don't often.The elderly go out about twice a day shopping or walking.A lot of old people like a cup of tea or coffee instead of cold drinks.Of the pupils at the Meridian School 110 have parents who commute to Cambridge or further.
